TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlAnchor extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class HtmlAnchor Inherits HtmlContainerControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler
type HtmlAnchor = class inherit HtmlContainerControl interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两种方法使用类。There are two ways to use the class. 第一个是用于导航： 使用属性来定义要链接到的页的位置。The first is for navigation: using the property to define the location of the page to link to. 第二个是回发事件： 使用事件以编程方式处理用户的单击的链接。The second is for postback events: using the event to programmatically handle the user's clicking a link. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件，以显示一条消息时单击控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchor/CS/htmlanchorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchor/VB/htmlanchorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例控件。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"A"文本的字符串。The "a" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态添加向 Web 窗体页的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically add an control to the Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorConstructor/CS/htmlanchorconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorConstructor/VB/htmlanchorconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 时执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下执行页验证时单击控件。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定控件是否与全部通过验证控件指定验证规则页上的验证控件相关联。Page validation determines whether controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性设置为 false。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to false.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the link specified in the server control.
The URL target of the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定的 URL 时链接到单击控件。Use this property to specify the URL to link to when the control is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的 Web 页时要导航到单击控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a Web page to navigate to when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 服务器控件中定义的书签名。

span.span: Gets or sets the bookmark name defined in the server control.
The bookmark name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性标记在网页上使用名称部分。Use this property to mark a section on a Web page with a name. 这使您可以从任何位置链接到本部分中的同一页面上。This allows you to link to this section from anywhere on the same page. 例如，您可以将直接链接到页上的标题页顶部的目录。For example, you can provide a table of contents at the top of a page that will link directly to topics on the page. 若要链接到标记的部分，请使用控件，其属性设置为节的名称前面带有 # 符号 (\)。To link to a marked section, use an control with the property set to the name of the section, preceded by a # symbol (\). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来标记在网页上的不同部分并链接到这些表中的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to mark different sections on the Web page, and link to them from a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使你可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此服务器事件会导致出现从客户端到服务器并返回一次往返过程。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 当单击控件时，显示一条消息。When the control is clicked, a message is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例修改上面的示例以编程方式指定和代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example modifies the preceding example to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClick/CS/htmlanchorserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClick/VB/htmlanchorserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此服务器事件会导致出现从客户端到服务器并返回一次往返过程。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 当单击控件时，显示一条消息。When the control is clicked, a message is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例修改上一个示例以编程方式指定和代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example modifies the previous example to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. summary.span: 获取或设置当单击 控件时，显示所链接到的网页的内容的浏览器窗口或框架的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page that is linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 时，显示所链接到的网页的内容的浏览器窗口或框架。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the is clicked.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的目标窗口或框架，将显示链接到时的网页的内容单击控件。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page that is linked to when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性将呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`特性，可以在`a`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许元素。The `target` attribute on `a` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be compliant with XHTML 1.1. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问的网页，应避免使用属性将另一个窗口作为目标。When creating accessible Web pages, avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必须以 A 到 Z （不区分大小写），除了以下特殊值，以下划线开头的范围内的字母开头。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性时显示的页导航在新的、 无框架窗口中单击控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the page that is navigated to when the control is clicked in a new, unframed window. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer is placed over the control.

value.span: 当鼠标指针放置在 控件上时所显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed when the mouse pointer is placed over the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性提供的自定义工具提示控件。Use this property to provide a custom ToolTip for the control. 当鼠标指针停留在控件上时显示此文本。This text is displayed when the mouse pointer rests over the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为工具提示中提供自定义文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the ToolTip. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时引发验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组可以分配给特定类别的页面上的验证控件。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定的验证组的名称为其控件回发到服务器时导致验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 属性不起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 指定的值时属性，只是指定组的一部分的验证控件的验证时控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果不指定此属性的值和属性设置为`true`，页面上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件时该控件回发到服务器进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
